#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Installation node =
=== Requirements ===

 1. JDK1.6 in c:\jdk1.6.0_xx
 1. svn client
 1. Ant
 1. MySQL
 1. Tomcat
 1. Python2.x

=== Setup ===
 1. Environment variables
   i. Set JAVA_HOME
   i. Make sure javac in PATH (for lbj to work)
   i. Set TOMCAT_HOME (for annieWeb to compile)
 1. Check-out code
   i. svn co svn://warbler.cs.uiuc.edu/ObjectSearch/core/trunk/annieDB
   i. svn co svn://warbler.cs.uiuc.edu/ObjectSearch/core/trunk/annieIndex
   i. svn co svn://warbler.cs.uiuc.edu/ObjectSearch/core/trunk/annieSearch
   i. svn co svn://warbler.cs.uiuc.edu/ObjectSearch/lbjse/lbjSearch
   i. svn co svn://warbler.cs.uiuc.edu/ObjectSearch/core/trunk/annieWeb
 1. Compile
   i. Go to each of the above directory '''in that order''', compile with ant
{{{
ant updateJar
ant dist
}}}
   i. Sync the annieWeb/WebContent with the one in Tomcat.
 1. Restart Tomcat
 1. If everything is going well, you can open the url : http://localhost:8080/annieWeb/professor/pageviewer.html on your machine
